body.name: wansview Security Camera Outdoor, 1080P Pan-Tilt 360° Surveillance Waterproof WiFi Camera, Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, Smart Siren, SD Card Storage& Cloud Storage,Works with Alexa W9 (With RJ45 Port)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 44 mins
FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 44 mins
features: 【2K HD & PTZ Coverage 】 High resolution images in 2K resolution ,wide-angle lens combined with 350° vertical rotation range to help you view every angle of your hous clearly. Powered by USB cable and this outdoor security camera only works with 2.4Ghz WIFI band.

【Infrared Clear Night Vision & IP65 Waterproof】Wansview security camera is equipped with 12pcs 850nm infrared LED lights, which switch to the smart night vision mode up to 50 feet. Intelligent IR-cut ensure see everything in any dark environment through real-time. IP65 waterproof feature is the best choice for outside use, allows you to keep monitoring in extreme environments no matter in storm and snowy weather.

【Instant Detection and Two-way Audio】 Outdoor Security Camera adopted motion sensors to detect the surrounding objects and sends alerts come with 10s video to your phone. The sensor sensitivity and detecting area can also be customized on Wansview Cloud APP to focus on the zone you want. Built-in microphone and speaker allow you to communicate with your lover no matter where you are.

【Flexible SD Card & Cloud Storages】SD card and Cloud Storage are optional choice for the user to save the recorded video. Built in SD card slot supports up to 128GB. Video and image can be stored to SD card for preview. The user also could save and upload the videos to the Cloud storage by subscribing the paid Cloud service. No need to worry about the camera be stolen or destroyed.

【Multiple Family Members Sharing and Works with Alexa 】Be able to share your security camera supports up to 4 users to access and view video simultaneously with invitation link on APP. Wansview camera allows linking Alexa Echo Show, you can request to display a live video of the camera through voice control.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 3,372 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Warm Tips: Only works with 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi.Requires a wall plug with wire, not battery-powered, powered by USB cable.Supports Micro SD card up to 128GB in FAT32 Format.Does not support 24/7 continuous recording, only supports motion recording. What's in the box? 1x W9 Camera,1x5Dbi WiFi Antenna, 1x 5V 1A USB Power supply, 1x Quick Installation Guide, and Mounting bracket set

2K HD Video with Pan/Tilt/ Zoom Wansview outdoor camera uses pan, tilt, and zoom to provide both wide-area 350° coverage and great detail with a single camera. Use Cloud APP to remotely control the camera up/down&left/ right with less blind area. With 3 Megapixel HD lens, this camera provides a great image quality, which makes it possible to view and capture the full area you are interested in. IP65 Waterproof With IP65 great weatherproof performance, Wansview outdoor security camera can prevent water from seeping into the camera and withstand a temperatures range from -10°C to 50°C, which is able to withstand more difficult and extreme conditions like wind, rain, snow. Two-way Audio & Night Vision Built-in enhanced microphone and speaker help you hear what's happening at home even when you are outside. A more convenient way of talking and listening to your family or scaring off the unexpected person on Wansview cloud App, which gives you peace of mind and 24-hour protection. The visible infrared LED lights provide you better and clear image in low-light conditions.

Instant Real-Time Alerts for safety You will receive an alert message if it detectes any unusual activities and be directed to the alert video page to see what was happening around your home. You could also download the alert videos from Wansview Cloud app. Simply adjust the sensor sensitivity and set the area you want to detect, No worry to miss any emergency events. Flexible SD card/Cloud Storage Methods Cloud storage and SD card storage(up to 128GB) are optional choices to the user for choosing one of them for recordings and playback. With all your recordings up on the cloud, you can easily browse or preview all videos of the day from Wansview Cloud APP directly. Enjoy greater flexibility and full control over your video recordings. Works with Alexa To use Alexa with this security camera, first, complete the camera setup by using Wansview Cloud app and then connect your camera to Alexa APP. Use voice control to display the live-feed of Wansview security cameras. Alexa will automatically give you friendly responses and execute your commands like "Alexa, show me the front door camera" "Sure, here you go."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: First off not expensive whatsoever but the quality of the picture and durability of the camera are impressive. Great deal if your looking for a home outdoor camera I got it for my apartment and I love it I've had it for bout a little over a year now and have had maybe one minor issue with it which it resolved itself. Overall great deal and perfect for home security and the subscription price for cloud storage and 24/7 recording is way inexpensive. I even got the indoor camera for my front room in my apartment audio and video are perfect I swear by this eansview brand it's easy to use and easy to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive outdoor cam packed with great features
reviews.reviewText: This inexpensive budget W9 outdoor cam packs a lot nice features, e.g. continuous live recording, 1080p HD video, camera 350 degrees panning, tilting & zooming, microSD up to 128 GB storage (a cheaper option than cloud subscription), alerts from motion detection, great night vision, 2-way talk, etc.The W9 camera uses USB-C/adaptor plug-in (not water-proof), so be sure that the connection to a power outlet is in a covered or sheltered location. The camera is fairly easy to set up using the Wansview app. However, the little instruction booklet is practically useless because of the tiniest print size and some pictures are not even viewable with a magnifying glass. This is the single most frustrating thing and I almost wanted to return the camera but I downloaded the instruction in 8" X 11" page format from the website and was able to quickly complete the setup.The mounting screws are included in the box but the angle (bad design) of the screw holes are slanted that would result in rounding the phillips screw head. The solution is to pre-drill the holes before installing the screws.If you run into any problems, don't hesitate to contact Wansview Support that has excellent friendly and timely customer service. This is great camera for under $40 (on sale) so I bought another one and control both cams on the same app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Upgrading my rating from three to four stars
reviews.reviewText: I bought four of these cameras and have been using them for about four months. They are a great value for the price and meet my needs well. Daytime picture quality is good (not really high resolution but good enough for my needs). Night vision is quite good as well. I can control pan/tilt from the Android App easily and setup was easy. My only complaint is the Windows App for the camera. Sometimes I want to monitor the cameras on my laptop in my office. But the Windows App for this camera does not allow you to look at recordings (the Android App does). So if an alarm gets activated while I am at my laptop, I have to go to the phone to take a look at what happened. I wish they would fix the Windows App to be able to view recording.May 9 2022. have been using the cameras for a few months now. cameras work fine in terms of daytime and night time vision and clarity of pictures. However, supporting infrastructure is problematic. Windows app still does not allow me to view recordings (you can only view recordings from a phone). And for the last two weeks, my windows app will not let me log into the server to view livestream video - it keeps saying "server busy try again". I don't know what the problem is. Also be aware that this camera works only on 2GHz band. if your router is dual band (2/5GHz), sometimes the camera gets confused and can hang up. then you have to reset.April 21 2023. The camera works well. However, the company does not make clear that you can only view the images/videos from your phone (Android or IOS). They used to have a windows app, but it does not work any more. Also, over the last two months, their server has failed for extended periods of time. So you cannot view images on your phone either during those times.April 23 2023. Just upgraded my rating from three to four stars. I am quite impressed with their technical and customer support. Two days ago, when all my cameras stopped working, i suspected a server problem at their end and notified them. They got back this morning saying the server problem has been fixed, and yes the cameras are working fine now. Things can always go wrong, but I greatly appreciate the company's prompt attention to the problem and taking care of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Need to be able to plug in to AC power
reviews.reviewText: This is my second camera setup was simple and took minutes they respond almost instantly and the audio is really clear the W9 is has a super sharp image and works well in low light without changing over to B&W I mounted this pretty far from the WiFi and have no problem with connecting I will definitely buy more of them
